org.kitodo.api.imagemanagement

Interface ImageManagementInterface


  • public interface ImageManagementInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Image changeDpi(URI imagefileUri, int dpi)
      Changes the dpi of an image at a given uri.
      boolean createDerivative(URI imageFileUri, double percent, URI resultFileUri, ImageFileFormat resultFileFormat)
      Creates a derivative for an image at a given path.
      Image getScaledWebImage(URI imageFileUri, double percent)
      Scales an image at a given path and returns it.
      Image getSizedWebImage(URI imageFileUri, int pixelWidth)
      changes the size (in pixel) of the image.

    • Method Detail

      • getScaledWebImage

        Image getScaledWebImage(URI imageFileUri,
                        double percent)
        Scales an image at a given path and returns it.
        Parameters:
        imageFileUri - The uri to the image which should be scaled.
        percent - The percentage for scaling.
        Returns:
        The scaled image.

      • createDerivative

        boolean createDerivative(URI imageFileUri,
                         double percent,
                         URI resultFileUri,
                         ImageFileFormat resultFileFormat)
        Creates a derivative for an image at a given path.
        Parameters:
        imageFileUri - The uri to the image.
        percent - The percentage of scaling for the derivative.
        resultFileUri - The uri to save the derivative to.
        resultFileFormat - The formate for the derivative.
        Returns:
        true, if creation was successful, false otherwise.

      • changeDpi

        Image changeDpi(URI imagefileUri,
                int dpi)
        Changes the dpi of an image at a given uri.
        Parameters:
        imagefileUri - The uri of the image.
        dpi - the new dpi.
        Returns:
        the image with the new dpi.

      • getSizedWebImage

        Image getSizedWebImage(URI imageFileUri,
                       int pixelWidth)
        changes the size (in pixel) of the image.
        Parameters:
        imageFileUri - The uri of the image to size.
        pixelWidth - The new pixelWidth.
        Returns:
        The new sized image
